comments:
0.7M1 - Bug - Launching

Attempting to launch a MIDlet via the MTJ Application launch type, I received the MTJCoreError.2561.  There are a couple of problems here.  First, I'm assuming the error message is just a key and that it was not properly localized.  Second, it appears that the launch requires a deployed jar file and that it is not there.  If a jar file is required for launching, the launch functionality needs to auto-deploy.  Deploying the project allowed launching to complete correctly.

org.eclipse.mtj.exception.MtjException: Jar file not found
	at org.eclipse.mtj.core.project.midp.MidpProjectExtensionProvider.getDeployment(MidpProjectExtensionProvider.java:97)
	at org.eclipse.mtj.extension.devide.project.MtjProject.getDeployment(MtjProject.java:581)
	at org.eclipse.mtj.extension.devide.launching.EmulatorLaunchConfigDelegate.getDeployment(EmulatorLaunchConfigDelegate.java:243)
	at org.eclipse.mtj.extension.devide.launching.EmulatorLaunchConfigDelegate.launch(EmulatorLaunchConfigDelegate.java:136)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:754)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:944)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

You mean the project can launch correctly after deploying the it? But I found nothing happens after selecting "Deploy" menu. And I try to "Build MTJ Project", but an error occurs which tells me "error in preverification".

The latest code will create a new build prior to launching.  That is what this error was indicating.  The error message has also been corrected to print out the proper text instead of a code.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 162223 ***
Build was done during the run
